text: Jean-Pierre Lehmann (29 August 1945 - 21 December 2017) was an American-born Swiss economist. He was born in Washington, D.C.. He was professor of international political economy at IMD and the founding director of The Evian Group at IMD. In August 2011, he was appointed senior fellow at the Fung Global Institute (FGI). Lehmann died on 21 December 2017 of a pulmonary embolism in Lausanne, Switzerland at the age of 72.IMD mourns the loss of Jean-Pierre Lehmann ==References== ==Other websites== * www.imd.org/eviangroup (Evian Group @ IMD Official Website) * www.imd.org * www.fungglobalinstitute.org Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American economists Category:Swiss economists Category:Swiss academics Category:Scientists from Washington, D.C.
